data.title: Initials
data.statement: You are given a list of names. You must output the initials of each name, with full stops after each letter, ignoring any titles (Dr', 'Mr', 'Mrs', 'Ms' , 'Lord', 'Lady' or 'Sir') and any degrees ('BA', 'LLB' , 'MD' or 'PhD) or other suffixes ('Jr' or 'Snr).

testCases.title: Two names with middle initial
testCases.testIn:
2
Harry S. Truman
John F. Kennedy

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn:
2
Michael J. Fox
Robert F. Kennedy

testCases.title: Names with titles
testCases.testIn:
3
Lord Alexander Stephen Holden Mountbatten
Sir Robert Peel
Mr A. Livingstone

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn:
3
Lady Isabella Louise Alexa Morrison
Sir George Orwell
Ms S. Smith

testCases.title: Names with titles and suffixes
testCases.testIn:
4
Mrs Madonna, Jr, PhD
Dr Phil Potts, MD
Joe Bloggs, LLB
Lady J. Hawkins, BA

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn:
4
Mr Prince, Snr, MD
Dr Becky Boots, MD
Joanne Bigs, LLB
Lord J. Heseltine, BA

data.constraints: The titles will only be one of 'Dr', 'Mr', 'Mrs', 'Ms' , 'Lord', 'Lady' or 'Sir', the degrees will only be one of 'BA', 'LLB' , 'MD' or 'PhD' and the only other possible suffixes are 'Jr' or 'Snr'
data.stubGenerator:
read n:int
loop n read name:string(1024)
write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1>>: An integer [[N]] for the number of names to initialise.
<<Next [[N]] lines>>: the Names to be initialised.
data.outputDescription: <<[[N]] lines>>: the initials of the input names.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are given a list of names. You must output the initials of each name, with full stops after each letter, ignoring any titles (Dr', 'Mr', 'Mrs', 'Ms' , 'Lord', 'Lady' or 'Sir') and any degrees ('BA', 'LLB' , 'MD' or 'PhD) or other suffixes ('Jr' or 'Snr).
Input
Line 1: An integer N for the number of names to initialise.
Next N lines: the Names to be initialised.
Output
N lines: the initials of the input names.
Constraints
The titles will only be one of 'Dr', 'Mr', 'Mrs', 'Ms' , 'Lord', 'Lady' or 'Sir', the degrees will only be one of 'BA', 'LLB' , 'MD' or 'PhD' and the only other possible suffixes are 'Jr' or 'Snr'
Example
Input
1
John Smith
Output
J.S.
